SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.Network.ServerPack

Class VirtualView

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.Network.ServerPack.VirtualView
public class VirtualView extends Object
Class that acts like a view for the server, it handles the "unpackaging" and "packaging" of the messages from and to the client

  • Method Details

    • addClient

      public void addClient(String username, ServerConnection serverSocket)
      Adds a client to the virtualView
      Parameters:
      username - of the user
      serverSocket - associated with the user

    • readAll

      public FullTileSelectionMessage readAll(String user, AskFullMsg msg)
      Reads all the data needed from the client; the tiles selected and the shelf's column

    • write

      public void write(String user, MsgType message, Object sendObject)
      Sends an output to the client, the type of the message and its content have to be already defined in the gameController
      Parameters:
      user - that will read the output
      message - that the client will receive

    • writeBroadcast

      public void writeBroadcast(MsgType message, Object sendObject)
      Sends a message in broadcast to all clients
      Parameters:
      message - that is sent in broadcast

    • endGame

      public void endGame(Map<String,Integer> mapPoints, Map<String,boolean[]> mapObjective)
      Sends to all the client connected at the game the statistics of the game just ended, in the form of a EndStatsMessage.
      Parameters:
      mapPoints - a map containing the players' username as the keys, and their points as the values
      mapObjective - a map containing the players' username as the keys, and their completion of the public objectives in the form of an array of two boolean

    • getUsernames

      public ArrayList<String> getUsernames()
      To return the list of usernames
      Returns:
      the list containing the username of all the players connected to the game

    • removeUsername

      public void removeUsername(String username)
      Remove the username from the sever.
      Parameters:
      username - the player's username
